content:
our future is looking swell

We're elevating our game. In an effort to upgrade our guest experience, we're thrilled to announce several upcoming hotel enhacement initiatives. 

Shorebreak Pool & Beach Walk
Major improvements to our Shorebreak Pool and private beach access are underway. Closure to the pool, spa and central beach gate will occur from Nov 26th until Dec 20th. Construction noise may occur Monday through Friday from 10a until 4p during this time.

Ocean Lounge & Pacific Porch
Our beloved Ocean Lounge and Pacific Porch will experience a fantastic update early 2019. Closure and construction noise will be anticipated during this time.

Guest Reception
In early 2019, we will be saying goodbye to our front desk and creating an entirely new arrival experience. Our new welcome area will also include a small market where one may purchase drinks, snacks, locally made arts and crafts, and other unique reminders of our cool place on the sand. During this time, the Guest Reception will be relocated to a convenient location.
 
Guest Rooms
We will be refreshing key design elements in our Guest rooms beginning early 2019. Since this is anticipated to be a low noise project, the hotel will remain open throughout this time. 

When it comes to delivering an exceptional experience for our cherished guests, we're all in.
